testsuite.name: com.mockcompany.webapp.controller.SearchControllerSpec

testcase.name: search will return an item that matches the name of the product
search will return multiple items when there are matches in the name
search will return an item that matches the description of the product
search will return multiple items when there are matches in the description
search will return items if name or description match the search
search will only match exactly on name or description when quotes are used
